channel.title: Free forum hosting - Dedicated
channel.description:
Well, after getting so bored, I decided to make free forums for people who are hosting off a free host with loads of shit pop ups and slow speed ect ect.
So, I am offering a free forum host that is on a dedicated server. The forums can come with SMF, IPB OR Vbulletin. Vbulletin is mostly a no, in less I think you are trust worthy enough and I have a spare register number around here. IPB I have around 10 register pins, so thats not a problem, and SMF is just free.
Contact my MSN - javaproject@hotmail.co.uk
[b]If this is violating the rules please tell me, but as far as I know, this does not come user selling/buying.[/b]

item.description:

Revolutiondodian:

Im about to start a 530 Rs server project, intergrated with php and mysql and im deciding weather to write my own website or use a forum BUT PLEASE HOLD A SPOT FOR ME :}

Will do.

cumescape:

I could host a Runescape Replica forum for you, its not a dedicated server but its still free.

SMF?
